title: 90 MB daily
info: 90 MB of Internet for 1 day at the price of 9 Afghanis. Only for Facebook. To activate DFB and to deactivate UDFB, send to 555.

title: 200 MB daily
info: 200 MB of Internet for 1 day at the price of 15 Afghanis. Only for Facebook. Send S6 to 555 to activate and U6 to deactivate.

title: 450 MB per month
info: 450 MB of Internet for 30 days at the price of 45 Afghanis. Only for Facebook. To activate FB50 and to deactivate UYFB, send to 555.

title: 650 MB per month
info: 650 MB of Internet for 30 days at the price of 65 Afghanis. Only for Facebook. To activate FB A and to deactivate FB D to 555.

title: 850 MB per month
info: 850 MB Internet for 30 days at the price of 90 Afghanis. Only for Facebook. Send S100 to 555 to activate and U100 to deactivate.

title: 1.9 GB per month
info: 1.9 GB of Internet for 30 days at the price of 199 Afghanis. Only for Facebook. Send S199 to activate and U199 to 555 to deactivate.

title: 3GB per month
info: 3 GB Internet for 30 days at the price of 299 Afghanis. Only for Facebook. Send S299 to activate and U299 to 555 to deactivate.
